PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-01302022-02-18,  ,  ECCC,  , 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to (1) add three waterbodies to Schedule 2, designating them as tailings impoundment areas (TIAs); (2) include changes to the financial guarantee requirements found in subsection 27.1(3); and (3) correct a minor error found in the waterbody coordinates for the designated TIAs in Item number 60 of Schedule 2.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0023 Publication Date: 2022-03-02
AttachmentsAttachment
